Package org.zurdavid.petrinets

Interface ITextView

All Known Implementing Classes:
TextView
public interface ITextView
The Interface provides methods to display text messages. The interface must be implemented by an element of the view. It is the return type of the method getTextView() in the IPetrinetAppView interface, which is the applications main view-interface. The interface is used by the controller.

  • Method Details

    • printSingleResult

      void printSingleResult(BoundednessAnalysisResult result, boolean showDialog)
      Prints the result of a boundedness analysis, formated as a single result. Optionally a pop-up message dialog is shown.
      Parameters:
      result - Boundedness analysis result to be printed.
      showDialog - Pop-up message is shown, if parameter is true.

    • printMultiResult

      void printMultiResult(BoundednessAnalysisResult result)
      Prints the result of a boundedness analysis, formated as a row in a table, to display the analysis results of multiple files.
      Parameters:
      result - Boundedness analysis result to be printed.

    • printHeader

      void printHeader()
      The method prints the header of the table to display the results of a boundedness analysis on multiple files.

    • printAnalysisStarted

      void printAnalysisStarted(String filename)
      The method prints a short message, informing that the analysis of a given file begins now.
      Parameters:
      filename - Name of the file.

    • clear

      void clear()
      Method clears the TextView. delete
